EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Today's call (1562165329.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Karen,
I hope all is well and thank you for your time on the phone with me. I appreciate it greatly. I can certainly work with you on your procurement needs. Outside of the paper please let me know what PPE equipment you use. Anything else that you need to source that I can provide a solution for would be appreciated. I will work on an overall solution for you. Thank you again and have a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>
